Html:
Hi,

I would appreciate if the latest release, or maybe even latest development version could be dropped in the source control repository.

Currently you can download the most recent version here - simply download archive, uncompress it and add "DynamicDataDisplay" project into your solution.
We'll upload this version into Source Control later.

Hi, kristogar!

I've uploaded latest source code into our repository.

Best regards,
Mikhail.
